info.title: ChawkBazar API
info.description: ChawkBazar E-commerce Platform REST API Documentation

get.description: Get paginated list of all abuse reports. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.
Get a single abuse report by ID. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

delete.description: Delete an abuse report. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

post.description: Accept an abuse report and delete the reported content. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.
Reject an abuse report and keep the content. Deletes all reports for this content. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Retrieve all addresses for the authenticated user.

post.description: Add a new address to the user's profile.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific address.

put.description: Update an existing address.

delete.description: Remove an address from the user profile.

post.description: Generate a creative product description using OpenAI based on product name and keywords. Requires STORE_OWNER or STAFF permission.

description.example: Experience pure sound with these Premium Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones...

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive analytics including revenue, refunds, orders, and sales trends. Accessible by Staff, Store Owners, and Super Admins.
Retrieve products where quantity is less than 10. Supports filtering by shop, type and language.

get.summary: Get product count distribution by category
get.description: Retrieve a list of categories with their respective product counts for the current user's scope.
Retrieve top categories based on total product sales volume.
Retrieve products sorted by their average rating. Accessible for shop-scoped analytics.
Returns paginated list of all uploaded attachments

post.description: Upload one or multiple files. Rate limited to 10 uploads per minute per user. Supports images, documents, and other file types. Images automatically generate thumbnails.

attachment[].description: Array of files to upload (supports multiple files)

422.description: Validation Error - Invalid file type or size

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded (10/min)

get.description: Returns a single attachment with its details

put.description: This endpoint is currently not implemented and will return false

delete.description: Permanently delete an attachment and its associated files from storage. Rate limited to 10 requests per minute.

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: List attributes. customizable by Shop.

post.description: Create a new attribute. Requires STORE_OWNER permission for the shop.

get.description: Get attribute details by ID or Slug

put.description: Update existing attribute. Requires permission.

delete.description: Delete an attribute. Requires permission.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of authors with product counts.

post.description: Create a new author. Requires active permissions for the associated shop.

get.description: Retrieve detailed author information by slug or ID.

put.description: Update author details. Requires permissions for the associated shop.

delete.description: Delete an author. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permissions.

get.description: Retrieve list of authors with the most products.

get.summary: Get information for becoming a seller
get.description: Retrieve static content and commission options for the 'Become a Seller' landing page.
Retrieve a paginated list of categories with optional filtering. Returns categories with their type, parent, children relationships and products count.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Filter by parent category. Use 'null' to get only root categories.

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Exclude category by ID (useful when editing to exclude self from parent dropdown)

post.description: Create a new product category. Requires admin permissions.

details.example: Browse our wide range of accessories.

parent.description: Parent category ID for nested categories

get.description: Retrieve detailed category information by slug or ID. Includes type, parent category, and children.

put.description: Update an existing category. Requires admin permissions.

details.example: Updated description for men's fashion category.

delete.description: Delete a category. Requires admin permissions. Note: Deleting a parent category may affect child categories.

get.description: Retrieve featured categories with their top products. Returns 3 categories by default. ChawkBazar specific endpoint.

post.description: Validates a cart's contents, applies taxes, and calculates shipping fees. This is typically the first step in the checkout process for both guests and customers.

billing_address.description: Billing address details (optional for verification index)

shipping_address.description: Shipping address details (optional for verification index)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of CMS pages like Privacy Policy, Terms, etc.

post.description: Create a new CMS page. Requires EDITOR or SUPER_ADMIN permissions.

get.summary: Get a CMS page by slug
get.description: Retrieve detailed CMS page information by slug.
Fetches a page by its URL path for Puck frontend rendering

post.description: Creates a new page or updates existing one by path. Requires EDITOR or SUPER_ADMIN permissions.

put.description: Update CMS page details. Requires EDITOR or SUPER_ADMIN permissions.

delete.description: Delete a CMS page. Requires EDITOR or SUPER_ADMIN permissions.

get.description: Returns currently active flash sale with its products. Used by ProductFlashSaleBlock component.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of products to return

get.description: Returns categories for CategoryBlock component display.
Returns collections/types for CollectionBlock component.
Returns products sorted by order count (popularity).
Returns products sorted by sold quantity.
Get a paginated list of conversations for the current user (as customer or shop owner/staff).
Retrieve details and messages of a single conversation.
Retrieve a paginated list of coupons with optional shop and language filtering.

post.description: Create a new coupon for a shop. Accessible by Store Owners and Super Admins.

get.description: Retrieve details of a coupon by its code/slug or incremental ID.

post.description: Check if a coupon code is valid for the current sub_total.

put.description: Update details of an existing coupon. Accessible by Staff, Owners, or Admins.

post.description: Approve a vendor-created coupon for public use. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.
Reject/disapprove a vendor coupon. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of FAQs. Filterable by shop_id and language.

post.description: Add a new FAQ. Accessible by Staff for their shop, Store Owners, and Super Admins.

faq_description.example: You can return any product within 30 days...

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific FAQ by ID.

put.description: Update details of an existing FAQ. Accessible by staff of the shop, Store Owners, or Super Admins.

delete.description: Remove an FAQ from the system. Accessible by authorized Staff, Owners or Admins.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of flash sales.
Retrieve details of a flash sale by its slug.

post.description: Approve a vendor's flash sale product request. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

id.description: Flash sale request ID to approve

post.description: Reject a vendor's flash sale product request. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

id.description: Flash sale request ID to reject

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of manufacturers/brands.

post.description: Create a new manufacturer. Requires permissions for the associated shop.

get.description: Retrieve detailed manufacturer information by slug or ID.

put.description: Update manufacturer details. Requires permissions for the associated shop.

delete.description: Delete a manufacturer. Requires shop permissions.

get.description: Retrieve list of manufacturers with the most products.
Get a paginated list of messages for a specific conversation.

post.description: Send a new message in a conversation.
Mark all messages in a conversation as read for the current user.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of orders. Customers see their own orders. Store Owners/Staff see orders for their shop. Super Admins see all.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Filter by Shop ID (for Store Owners/Staff)

post.description: Create specific order with products. Primarily for customers.

get.description: Retrieve order details by ID or Tracking Number. Access restricted to the Customer who owns it, or Store Owner/Staff of the shop.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this order

put.description: Update the status of an order. Requires STORE_OWNER or STAFF permission for the related shop.

delete.description: Delete an order. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Retrieve order details using tracking number. Publicly accessible for valid tracking numbers.

post.description: Process payment for an existing order

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of products with optional filtering by category, shop, type, price range, and more.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter products by name or description

post.description: Create a new product. Requires STAFF or STORE_OWNER permissions.

description.example: Polarized sunglasses reduce glare reflected off of roads, bodies of water, snow and other horizontal surfaces.

sale_price.description: Must be less than or equal to price

get.description: Retrieve detailed product information by slug or ID. Includes related products.

put.description: Update an existing product. Requires STAFF or STORE_OWNER permissions for the shop.

403.description: Forbidden - you don't have permission to update this product

delete.description: Soft delete a product. Requires STAFF or STORE_OWNER permissions for the shop.

403.description: Forbidden - you don't have permission to delete this product

get.description: Retrieve products sorted by total sold quantity. Useful for showcasing top performers.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of products to return

get.description: Retrieve products sorted by order count (popularity). Supports filtering by shop, type, and date range.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of products to return

parameters.name: type_slug
parameters.description: Filter by type/collection slug (alternative to type_id)

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Number of days to look back for popularity calculation

404.description: Type not found (if type_slug is provided but not found)

get.summary: Calculate rental price for a product
get.description: Calculates the total rental price based on duration, quantity, and selected features. Also checks availability for the given date range.
Returns a paginated list of drafted products belonging to the user's shop(s).
Returns a paginated list of products with inventory less than 10 belonging to the user's shop(s).

200.description: Paginated list of products with low stock

get.description: List questions. Filter by product_id to see questions for a product.

post.description: Submit a question for a product. Requires CUSTOMER permission.

put.description: Update question (usually to add an answer). Requires STORE_OWNER permission for the shop.

delete.description: Delete a question. Requires permission.

get.description: List questions asked by the authenticated user.
Retrieve a paginated list of refund requests. Customers see their own; Admin/Owners see relevant ones.

post.description: Submit a new refund request for an order. Requires CUSTOMER permission.

description.example: I received a different item than ordered.

get.description: Retrieve details of a single refund request.

put.description: Update a refund request status (approve, reject, processing). When approved, credits customer wallet and deducts from shop balance. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

delete.description: Delete a refund request. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of refund policies.
Retrieve details of a refund policy by its slug.
Retrieve a paginated list of refund reasons.
Retrieve details of a refund reason by its ID or slug.
List reviews for a product.

post.description: Submit a review for a product. Requires CUSTOMER permission.

get.description: Get a singel review details

put.description: Update a review. Requires permission.

delete.description: Delete a review. Requires permission.

post.description: Create or update platform-wide settings (currency, language, SEO, etc.). Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Get list of all shipping classes/zones. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

post.description: Approve a pending shop and set commission rate. Activates shop and publishes all products. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.
Disable a shop and set all its products to draft. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.

get.description: Retrieve all shops owned by the authenticated user.

Get paginated list of all users. Requires SUPER_ADMIN permission.
